tables.name: evm_blocks
tables.description: EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) block data in the Cosmos ecosystem, including metadata about each block.

columns.name: height
columns.description: The height of the block in the Cosmos blockchain, representing the sequential order of blocks.

columns.name: timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in the Cosmos blockchain, indicating when the block was created.

columns.name: hash
columns.description: The hash of the EVM block, ensuring the integrity and uniqueness of the block within the blockchain.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the EVM block data was ingested into the system, representing when the data was processed.

tables.name: evm_logs
tables.description: This table contains logs from EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) smart contracts on the Cosmos blockchain network. It provides insights into the activities of these contracts and their interactions with the blockchain.

columns.name: address
columns.description: The address of the EVM smart contract that triggered the log.

columns.name: data
columns.description: The hexadecimal data associated with the log.

columns.name: block_hash
columns.description: The hash of the block in which the log was recorded.

columns.name: log_index
columns.description: The index of the log within the block.

columns.name: transaction_hash_evm
columns.description: The hash of the EVM transaction that triggered the log.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the log was ingested into the system.

columns.name: topics
columns.description: The list of topics associated with the log.

tables.name: evm_tokens_sales
tables.description: This table contains sales data of EVM tokens in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the blockchain transactions and their corresponding marketplaces.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_hash_evm
columns.description: The EVM-compatible transaction hash.

columns.name: log_index
columns.description: The index of the log entry in the transaction.

columns.name: marketplace
columns.description: The marketplace involved in the token sale.

columns.name: from
columns.description: The account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: to
columns.description: The account that received the tokens.

columns.name: token_address
columns.description: The address of the token being sold.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested from the blockchain.

tables.name: evm_transactions
tables.description: This table contains a collection of Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) transactions from the Cosmos ecosystem. It includes essential details such as transaction hash, sender, and recipient.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the EVM transaction was recorded.

columns.name: hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the EVM transaction.

columns.name: hash_evm
columns.description: The hash of the EVM transaction on the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: evm_index
columns.description: The index of the EVM transaction in the block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The amount of gas consumed by the EVM transaction.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred in the EVM transaction.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender in the EVM transaction.

columns.name: evm_sender
columns.description: The sender's address in the EVM transaction format.

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: The address of the recipient in the EVM transaction.

columns.name: code
columns.description: The opcode or instruction executed in the EVM transaction.

columns.name: data
columns.description: The data attached to the EVM transaction.

columns.name: index
columns.description: The index of the EVM transaction in the block.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas allowed for the EVM transaction.

columns.name: tx_json
columns.description: The raw JSON data of the EVM transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the EVM transaction was ingested into the database.

columns.name: MsgEthereumTx
columns.description: The Cosmos SDK message type for the EVM transaction.

columns.name: LegacyTx
columns.description: A legacy transaction type.

columns.name: AccessListTx
columns.description: An access list transaction type.

columns.name: DynamicFeeTx
columns.description: A dynamic fee transaction type.

columns.name: raw_data
columns.description: The raw data of the EVM transaction.

columns.name: TxRaw
columns.description: The raw EVM transaction data.

columns.name: gas_price
columns.description: The price of gas used in the EVM transaction.

tables.name: evm_transfer_event
tables.description: This table provides information on transfer events across the Cosmos ecosystem, capturing details of token movements between accounts.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transfer event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the transfer event was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash_evm
columns.description: The hash of the transaction containing the transfer event, in the EVM-compatible format.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The hash of the transaction containing the transfer event, in the native blockchain format.

columns.name: log_index
columns.description: The index of the log entry within the transaction that triggered the transfer event.

columns.name: token_address
columns.description: The address of the token involved in the transfer event.

columns.name: from
columns.description: The address from which the token was transferred.

columns.name: to
columns.description: The address to which the token was transferred.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of token transferred during the event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transfer event data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: evm_transfer_single_event
tables.description: This table contains information about token transfers on the Cosmos ecosystem blockchains, providing insights into the flow of assets within the network. The data is sourced from blockchain events and helps track token movements from one address to another.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transfer event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was mined, indicating the time the transfer event occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash_evm
columns.description: The Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) transaction hash, used for cross-chain compatibility.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique identifier for the blockchain transaction in which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: log_index
columns.description: The index of the transfer event within the transaction log.

columns.name: token_address
columns.description: The address of the token being transferred, used to identify the asset type.

columns.name: operator
columns.description: The entity responsible for the token transfer, such as a validator or a smart contract.

columns.name: from
columns.description: The address from which the tokens were transferred.

columns.name: to
columns.description: The address to which the tokens were transferred.

columns.name: id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transfer event, used for data tracking and analysis.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The quantity of tokens transferred during the event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transfer data was ingested into the system, indicating the data's freshness and accuracy.

tables.name: evm_uniswap_v2_dex_swaps
tables.description: This table provides information on Uniswap V2 DEX swaps executed on the Cosmos ecosystem. It includes details of the swaps, such as the pairs involved, the tokens exchanged, and the time of the swaps.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_hash_evm
columns.description: The hash of the EVM transaction.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The hash of the transaction.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The sender of the transaction.

columns.name: evm_sender
columns.description: The sender of the EVM transaction.

columns.name: log_index
columns.description: The index of the log entry.

columns.name: pair
columns.description: The Uniswap V2 pair involved in the swap.

columns.name: dex_router
columns.description: The Uniswap V2 router used for the swap.

columns.name: to
columns.description: The recipient of the tokens in the swap.

columns.name: amount_0_in
columns.description: The amount of the first token transferred in.

columns.name: amount_1_in
columns.description: The amount of the second token transferred in.

columns.name: amount_0_out
columns.description: The amount of the first token transferred out.

columns.name: amount_1_out
columns.description: The amount of the second token transferred out.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: evmos_blocks
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Blocks Dataset: This dataset contains information about blocks in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into network activity and block production. It includes data on block height, timestamp, and other key metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was produced.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash of the validators involved in the block production process.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block data was ingested into the dataset.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: The total size of the messages included in the block, in bytes.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: The total number of transactions included in the block.

tables.name: evmos_convert_ERC20
tables.description: This table tracks conversions of ERC20 tokens from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into token transfers and balances. The data is sourced from blockchain events.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The action number of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender who initiated the transaction.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the recipient who received the token.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred.

columns.name: erc20_token
columns.description: The ERC20 token being converted.

columns.name: cosmos_coin
columns.description: The Cosmos coin being converted or used in the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: evmos_convert_coin
tables.description: This table represents blockchain transactions within the Cosmos ecosystem, detailing conversions between different cryptocurrencies.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the transaction occurred in the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the transaction was mined.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction message within the block.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The index of the specific action within the transaction message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The wallet address that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The wallet address that received the cryptocurrency.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of cryptocurrency involved in the transaction.

columns.name: cosmos_coin
columns.description: The specific Cosmos-based cryptocurrency involved in the transaction.

columns.name: erc20_token
columns.description: The specific Ethereum-based token (ERC20) involved in the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: evmos_delegate
tables.description: This table contains information about transactions and actions on the Cosmos blockchain, specifically related to validators and token transfers. It provides a detailed breakdown of each transaction, including sender and recipient information.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block at which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator that processed the transaction.

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: delegator
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: parsed_EVMOS_amount
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: The new shares allocated to the sender as a result of the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: evmos_developer_revenue
tables.description: This table contains developer revenue data from the Cosmos ecosystem blockchains, providing insights into the financial activities of developers within the network. It offers a comprehensive view of the revenue generated by developers through various transactions.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was recorded on the blockchain.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The action number in the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender involved in the transaction.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of cryptocurrency transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: amount_in_usdc
columns.description: The amount of USDC equivalent to the transferred cryptocurrency.

columns.name: contract
columns.description: The address of the contract involved in the transaction.

columns.name: withdraw_address
columns.description: The address to which the withdrawn funds were transferred.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: evmos_event_attributes
tables.description: This table provides information about the attributes associated with events on the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem. It allows for analysis of various event attributes across different blockchains.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event occurred.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the Cosmos blockchain on which the event occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The ID of the transaction in which the event occurred.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the transaction in which it occurred.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: The source of the event, indicating the module or contract that triggered it.

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute within the event in which it occurred.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the event occurred.

tables.name: evmos_ibc_receive
tables.description: This table contains information about incoming Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC) packets received by the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides a detailed view of the packets' attributes.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the IBC packet was received.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the IBC packet was received.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction that initiated the IBC packet.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that initiated the IBC packet.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that initiated the IBC packet.

columns.name: packet_src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the IBC packet.

columns.name: packet_dts_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the IBC packet.

columns.name: packet_connection
columns.description: The connection ID of the IBC packet.

columns.name: packet_sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the IBC packet.

columns.name: packet_ack
columns.description: The acknowledgment status of the IBC packet.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The validator or address that sent the IBC packet.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The validator or address that received the IBC packet.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens sent through the IBC packet.

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: The path of the token transfer through the IBC packet.

columns.name: token_alias
columns.description: The alias of the token sent through the IBC packet.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the token sent through the IBC packet.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Any additional information provided with the IBC packet.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: evmos_ibc_transfer
tables.description: This table contains information about Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC) transfers within the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides a detailed view of token movements between different blockchain networks.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transfer was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block containing the transfer was mined.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction containing the IBC transfer.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that contains the IBC transfer.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The action number of the IBC transfer within the message.

columns.name: packet_src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the IBC packet.

columns.name: packet_dts_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the IBC packet.

columns.name: packet_connection
columns.description: The connection ID of the IBC packet.

columns.name: packet_sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the IBC packet.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender of the IBC transfer.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the recipient of the IBC transfer.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred in the IBC transfer.

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: The path of tokens transferred in the IBC transfer.

columns.name: token_alias
columns.description: The alias of the token transferred in the IBC transfer.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Any additional information or memo associated with the IBC transfer.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the token transferred in the IBC transfer.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: evmos_ibc_transfer_delays
tables.description: This table provides insights into the delays experienced by IBC (Inter-Blockchain Communication) transfers on the Cosmos ecosystem. It helps analyze and understand the timing discrepancies between transfer initiation and acknowledgement on various blockchains.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the IBC transfer transaction.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block where the IBC transfer transaction was initiated.

columns.name: ack_block_height
columns.description: Height of the block where the IBC transfer acknowledgement was received.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account that initiated the IBC transfer transaction.

columns.name: tx_delay
columns.description: Time delay experienced by the IBC transfer transaction, calculated as the difference between the block timestamp and the acknowledgement block timestamp.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block where the IBC transfer transaction was initiated.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the IBC transfer data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: evmos_message_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains various attributes of messages from the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem. It provides information about the attributes associated with specific events on the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event occurred.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event in the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute in the message.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: evmos_message_types_transactions

columns.name: nth_action

columns.name: sender

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message sent across the network.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: evmos_redelegate

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the redelegation was recorded.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: source_validator
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: source_moniker
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: destination_validator
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: destination_moniker
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: delegator
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: evmos_amount
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: completion_time

tables.name: evmos_sends
tables.description: This table displays all the transactions (txs) sent across the Cosmos network, providing a comprehensive overview of the blockchain activity. It captures the key details of each transaction, including sender, recipient, and token transfers.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was mined.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the transaction was mined.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The type of action (e.g., transfer) performed in the transaction.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: recipient
columns.description: The address of the account that received the transaction.

columns.name: tokens_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred in the transaction.

columns.name: tokens_denom
columns.description: The denomination (e.g., atom, ubi, luna) of the tokens transferred.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: evmos_transactions
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive collection of transaction data from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the blockchain's activity and behavior.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block within which the transaction was committed.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the specific Cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Detailed information about the transaction, including its type and parameters.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: A human-readable message describing the outcome of the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The amount of coins paid by the sender as a transaction fee.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: The return code of the transaction, indicating its success or failure.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The total amount of gas consumed by the transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: The amount of gas requested by the sender to execute the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was ingested into the blockchain.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A note or comment left by the sender or receiver of the transaction.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the transaction schema used to validate the transaction.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: The coins used to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: The account that granted the funds to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: The account that paid the transaction fee.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas that can be consumed by the transaction.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the transaction was executed in single-sign mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: JSON data containing information about the multi-signature transaction.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the transaction will timeout if not executed.

tables.name: evmos_undelegate

tables.name: evmos_validators
tables.description: This table tracks information about validators in the Cosmos ecosystem, including their operational details, commission rates, and tokens. It provides valuable insights into the validator landscape and their performance.

columns.description: Unique address of the validator's account.

columns.name: operator_address

columns.name: consensus_pubkey

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the validator, e.g., bonded, unbonded, etc.

columns.description: Human-readable name of the validator.

columns.name: identity

columns.description: No description available

columns.name: Snapshot_date
columns.description: No description available

columns.name: proposer_hashed_address
columns.description: No description available

tables.name: evmos_voting
tables.description: This table represents voting data from the Cosmos ecosystem, capturing the votes cast by validators and community members on proposals. The data provides insights into the voting behavior and decision-making process within the Cosmos network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the vote was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The identifier of the transaction that contains the voting data.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that contains the voting data.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The action index of the vote within the message.

columns.name: voter
columns.description: The validator or community member who cast the vote.

columns.name: proposal_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the proposal being voted on.

columns.name: proposal_option
columns.description: The specific option chosen by the voter in the proposal.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: evmos_withdraw_rewards
tables.description: This table contains information about rewards withdrawal events from the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides details about the transactions and actions performed by validators.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the withdrawal event was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction in which the withdrawal event occurred.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that triggered the withdrawal event.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that performed the withdrawal.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator account that initiated the withdrawal event.

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: The human-readable name of the validator account.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The account that received the withdrawn rewards.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens withdrawn from the validator's account.

columns.name: token_amount_in_usdc
columns.description: The value of the withdrawn tokens in USDC.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the withdrawn tokens.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the database.
